posts.post_title: FS: Polar Bear Tobacco Advertising Piece (t206 Related)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhett Yeakley
I have a pretty neat piece hat would go well with ones T206 collection. The front features the same design found on packages of Polar Bear tobacco while the back features a song (or poem?) -- pretty risque wording whatever it is.

Anyways, the piece is in overall pretty nice shape as can be seenin the scan. I can't be 100% certain as to the date of the item, but it definitely has ties to the T206 era.

Price is  $75 shipped . Paypal or check/mo are fine. email to rhettyeakley@netzero.com
